translation.en: Beer.
translation.ja: ビール

translation.en: A wise man once said that beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
translation.ja: 理想的な気分にさせるのが ビールだそうだ

translation.en: Couldn't agree more.
translation.ja: 全く同感

translation.en: First one's on the house.
translation.ja: １杯目は無料だ

translation.en: Uh, actually, I'm looking for the Accommodator.
translation.ja: アコモデーターを探している

translation.en: Sorry. We don't have the Accommodator.
translation.ja: そのビールはない

translation.en: Yeah, it's not a beer. It's a dildo.
translation.ja: 大人のおもちゃのことだ

translation.en: What? Why does everyone think this is a porn shop?
translation.ja: なぜアダルトショップと 思うんだ？

translation.en: Well, we're in Van Nuys, and you spelled extreme with triple X's, so...
translation.ja: 場所がバンナイズだし 店名にＸが３つある

translation.en: Okay, because my last name is Rodman, and the beer,
translation.ja: 僕の名字がロッドマンで 〝過激なロッドマン〞 うちのビールは過激だからだ

translation.en: as you will taste, is very extreme.
translation.ja: うちのビールは過激だからだ

translation.en: - This is my most drinkable ale. - Mmm! It's called the Rod Guzzler.
translation.ja: このエールは “ロッド･ガズラー(棒の大食い)”だ

translation.en: - This is bright beer. Nothing fresher. - Bright beer.
translation.ja: 出来たてのブライトビールだ

translation.en: Mmm! Incredible.
translation.ja: うまい

translation.en: If you just sold dildos and fetish wear
translation.ja: 看板どおりに性具を売れば―

translation.en: like you advertise, this place would be a home run, Wilheim.
translation.ja: 大成功するよ ウィルヘルム

translation.en: My name's Wilhelm.
translation.ja: ヴィルヘルムだ

translation.en: My real name's Will, but I had it legally changed to Wilhelm,
translation.ja: ウィルから 正式に改名した

translation.en: in honor of the Bavarian duke responsible for the Reinheitsgebot,
translation.ja: 1516年に ビール純粋令を制定した―

translation.en: which is the beer purity law of 1516.
translation.ja: ヴィルヘルム４世に ちなんでだ

translation.en: Ooh, Chuy, Chuy, Ch- Chuy! Come here!
translation.ja: チュイ 来いよ

translation.en: Come here. You gotta meet this guy.
translation.ja: 紹介するよ

translation.en: Chuy used to work at the auto body shop next door, and I poached him because he wanted a little career change.
translation.ja: 隣の修理工場にいた 彼を引き抜いた

translation.en: I wanna be a businessman, so I watch him.
translation.ja: 彼はビジネスのお手本だ

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Chuy.
translation.ja: それはどうも

translation.en: If I just do the opposite of whatever he does, sky's the limit for me.
translation.ja: 彼のふり見て我がふり直せば 前途洋々だ

translation.en: - Yeah. - Okay.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: Hey, boss, tonight I'm throwing a tasting party  for my soccer buds.
translation.ja: 今夜 サッカー仲間と 試飲会をするんだけど

translation.en: Mind if I take home a little research?
translation.ja: もらっていい？

translation.en: Take whatever you want. You know that's the rule.
translation.ja: 持ち帰り自由という ルールだ

translation.en: Thank you. Later, man.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: What a great guy, right? - Incredible. - He's a gem.
translation.ja: いいヤツだろ　貴重な社員だ

translation.en: - You're lucky to have him. - Nope, drop it.
translation.ja: 社員に恵まれてる ダメよ

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.ja: なんだよ

translation.en: Your car's being towed.
translation.ja: 駐車禁止だよ

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.ja: しまった

translation.en: - Mm- kay. Bye. - Oh, shit.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: - So sorry. See you again. - Bye, Ben. Nice meeting you.
translation.ja: 残念だけど また来てね

translation.en: - Bye! Okay. - Hope you get your dildo.
translation.ja: 性具探しを頑張って

translation.en: Stop letting Chuy take the booze.
translation.ja: 持ち帰り禁止よ

translation.en: Will, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 何してるの？

translation.en: - LeBron James or Abe Lincoln? -
translation.ja: リンカーン？

translation.en: - Colonel Sanders. -
translation.ja: カーネルおじさん

translation.en: Oh, my God, Will, get your shit together.
translation.ja: しっかりしてよね

translation.en: Everything is gonna be fine, okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫だって

translation.en: The distributor's coming by today. He likes our beer.
translation.ja: 卸売業者に気に入られた

translation.en: - We're golden. Stop being a buzzkill. - Oh, my God. I--
translation.ja: 最高だぜ　水を差すな

translation.en: I see how much you drink, okay? Nothing can kill your buzz.
translation.ja: 飲みすぎだから シラケないのよ

translation.en: Even your dog is day drunk.
translation.ja: 飼い犬まで酔ってる

translation.en: So what? He's a little drunk.
translation.ja: フライアー･ルーカスには 節度がある

translation.en: - Friar Lucas knows when to say when. - Does he?
translation.ja: フライアー･ルーカスには 節度がある そう？

translation.en: Come here. I got a question for you.
translation.ja: 質問があるの

translation.en: - Why did you put the darts on this side? - Ah, let me tell you why.
translation.ja: なぜ こちら側でダーツ？ 理由がある

translation.en: I needed room for my latest genius promotion.
translation.ja: 宣伝する場所が 必要だったんだ

translation.en: Ta- da, huh? Pretty good.
translation.ja: ジャーン ジャーン 〝グラウラー(持ち帰り瓶)は返却を〞 〝グラウラー(持ち帰り瓶)は返却を〞 〝グラウラー(持ち帰り瓶)は返却を〞 いいだろ

translation.en: You take a growler home with you, and then you get another one for free when you come back.
translation.ja: グラウラーを持ち帰り 返却したらまた１本無料

translation.en: - It's gonna catch on like wildfire. -
translation.ja: 大流行するよ

translation.en: I think it already has.
translation.ja: もう広まってる

translation.en: No, hey, that is the wrong kind of growler. You can't do that here!
translation.ja: 誤解してるぜ ここで大きい方するなよ

translation.en: Hey, the sign says I can. Take a growler, leave a growler. Same thing.
translation.ja: “グラウラー(大便)は返却を”と 書いてある

translation.en: No, not my kind of growlers.
translation.ja: その意味じゃない

translation.en: - Please, get out of here. -
translation.ja: 帰ってくれ

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no!
translation.ja: ふんづけた！

translation.en: Yes. You see, to my point,
translation.ja: 言ったろ？

translation.en: I'm taking a growler here, and this morning,
translation.ja: 今朝の落とし物を

translation.en: I left a growler there.
translation.ja: そこに返却した

translation.en: You see? Same thing.
translation.ja: 同じだろ

translation.en: - You need shoes. - It's sanitary. - I... don't need these anymore. -
translation.ja: 靴ならあげるから やめてくれ

translation.en: You have to promise me you will stop taking a growler!
translation.ja: ここで大きい方をしないで

translation.en: But can I leave a growler?
translation.ja: でも ここに返却していい？

translation.en: I'm gonna give you my shoes, and you're gonna go, okay?
translation.ja: 靴をあげるから 帰ってくれ

translation.en: But that I could, my dear man.
translation.ja: そうできればいいが

translation.en: Since the death of printed media, I'm at a loss for wipes, hmm?
translation.ja: 新聞紙がなくなったので 尻をふく紙がない

translation.en: Ever tried to wipe your ass with a Kindle?
translation.ja: 電子書籍でふく？

translation.en: - - No!
translation.ja: よせよ

translation.en: - Back to the statehouse, Senator. - Senator? What?
translation.ja: 議員は中に戻れ 議員？ 何だよ

translation.en: The rock shoe of the white, urban climber.
translation.ja: 都会人のアウトドアシューズ メレルか

translation.en: Hmm. The hops are timid, and there's a meek earthiness vying for attention.
translation.ja: ホップが弱くて 土の香りは控えめで隠れてる

translation.en: Detecting a delicate bouquet of pine with notes of citrus.
translation.ja: 松の繊細な香りに 柑橘(かんきつ)系の風味もある

translation.en: Possibly clementines?
translation.ja: ミカンかな？

translation.en: - He's good. -
translation.ja: プロだ

translation.en: If the brewmaster remembered that he was making a beer and not a smoothie, you might really have something here.
translation.ja: スムージーを作ったのなら これは大したものだろう

translation.en: Unfortunately, the beer, much like the brewmaster himself,
translation.ja: 残念だが ビールの味も 作った職人も―

translation.en: smells like, as he would say, Scheiße!
translation.ja: いわゆる “クソ”だ

translation.en: - You can pour that out. - Hello, Adam.
translation.ja: 流そう アダム

translation.en: - Nice to see you, too. - Hi.
translation.ja: 久しぶりだな

translation.en: Wait. Who's this guy?
translation.ja: この人は誰？

translation.en: - My brother. - Bring it in.
translation.ja: 兄だ 来いよ

translation.en: - - Oh, shit!
translation.ja: うわっ

translation.en: Family.
translation.ja: 家族だな

translation.en: - Will, I didn't know you had a brother. - Yeah, I haven't seen Oxy in a long time.
translation.ja: 兄がいたのか？ オキシは久しぶりだ

translation.en: Aww, that's a cute nickname.
translation.ja: いい名ね

translation.en: Unless it's short for Oxycontin.
translation.ja: まさか薬のオキシ？

translation.en: No, it's short for oxidation.
translation.ja: 酸化のことだ

translation.en: Oxidation destroys beer... and Adam destroys everything.
translation.ja: 酸はビールの敵で アダムは全ての敵だ

translation.en: I can get you Oxy.
translation.ja: 薬(オキシ)やるよ

translation.en: We should be so close.
translation.ja: 昔は仲が良かった

translation.en: Adam and I were adopted by farmers in beautiful Yakima Valley.
translation.ja: 農家の養子の僕らは ホップ栽培が盛んな ヤキマバレーで育った

translation.en: And as you know, that's where 70% of American hops are grown.
translation.ja: ホップ栽培が盛んな ヤキマバレーで育った

translation.en: Nobody knows that, and nobody cares.
translation.ja: そんなの どうでもいい

translation.en: I'm actually angry that I know now.
translation.ja: 聞いてムカついた

translation.en: Pipe down! I'm painting a picture.
translation.ja: 黙って聞けよ

translation.en: Adam snuck me my first beer, and I thought it was horrible.
translation.ja: 僕が初めて飲んだビールは すごくまずかった

translation.en: And that's when he said, We can make it better.
translation.ja: “うまいのを作ろう”と 兄が言った

translation.en: The next few years,
translation.ja: 数年後には

translation.en: we became the best beer- making duo around. We even entered a beer contest.
translation.ja: ビール作りコンビとして ビール品評会にも出た

translation.en: You guys entered a beer contest when you were that young?
translation.ja: 子どもがビール品評会？ 〝ヤキマバレー ビール品評会〞

translation.en: - - And we won.
translation.ja: 優勝したんだ

translation.en: - That's great. - Not great.
translation.ja: すごいね 違うんだ

translation.en: Adam really wanted to use his beer, but I knew mine was better, so...
translation.ja: アダムのビールより 僕の方がうまい

translation.en: at the last minute, I switched them.
translation.ja: だから入れ替えたんだ

translation.en: When he found out...
translation.ja: 兄は気付き…

translation.en: ...he was pissed.
translation.ja: 激怒した

translation.en: I will never work with you again.
translation.ja: お前とは もう組まない

translation.en: Traitor!
translation.ja: 裏切り者！

translation.en: And I never saw him again... till today.
translation.ja: 会うのは その日以来だ

translation.en: Look, the guy makes really, really good beer.
translation.ja: アダムが いいビールを 作るのは確かだが…

translation.en: - It's just that-- - Will, like, come on.
translation.ja: いいじゃない

translation.en: You spent your money on a place that's way too big,
translation.ja: 大きすぎる場所を 借りてるのに

translation.en: and there's barely any customers.
translation.ja: 客はいない

translation.en: Um, by the way, boss, taking a growler means to shit.
translation.ja: グラウラーは 大便という意味だ

translation.en: Where were you a week ago?
translation.ja: 先に言えよな

translation.en: Whatever you think about your brother, if he makes amazing beer, why not give him a shot?
translation.ja: すご腕のビール職人なら チャンスをあげたら？

translation.en: So...
translation.ja: チームで話しあったんだが

translation.en: I have discussed it with my team, and we have decided
translation.ja: チームで話しあったんだが お前の採用には条件がある まず…

translation.en: to let you work with us on the following conditions--
translation.ja: お前の採用には条件がある まず…

translation.en: I accept.
translation.ja: 引き受けた

translation.en: We gotta make a lot of changes around here.
translation.ja: かなり変更するぞ

translation.en: You gotta change the way you're marketing this place.
translation.ja: マーケティング改革だ

translation.en: Yes, okay, great. That's exactly what we shall do.
translation.ja: いいね　そうしよう

translation.en: Okay, let's get rid of that barrel, these menus.
translation.ja: 樽(たる)もメニューも外す

translation.en: - What? - Get rid of those games.
translation.ja: は？ ゲームもテーブルやイスは ガラクタ置き場に返却だ

translation.en: No chairs, no tables. Send 'em back to the junkyard I assume you got them from.
translation.ja: ゲームもテーブルやイスは ガラクタ置き場に返却だ

translation.en: Maybe board up these windows.
translation.ja: 窓は板張り

translation.en: - Why? - 'Cause they look like shit.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 景色が悪い

translation.en: Okay, pool tables and beer pong, here we come.
translation.ja: ビリヤード台を入れる？

translation.en: No, the opposite. We want this whole place to be stripped down.
translation.ja: その逆で ここは必要最小限にする

translation.en: We want people to be able to meditate on the beer.
translation.ja: ビールについて黙想する場だ

translation.en: I want our customers to see the way I prepare the grist for the mash tun.
translation.ja: 麦芽をマッシング(糖化)するのを 客に見てほしい

translation.en: - Oh, my God, he is worse than you. - Told ya.
translation.ja: ウィル以上だ だろ

translation.en: And you guys could really stand to fix yourselves up a little bit.
translation.ja: 君らも何とかしなきゃな

translation.en: Do you work here?
translation.ja: 従業員？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: はい？

translation.en: Yes, Chuy, you work here.
translation.ja: チュイは社員だ

translation.en: - Yes! Yes. - Yes, you do. You do.
translation.ja: そうよ そう

translation.en: Okay, great. And you're wearing sandals in a brewery?
translation.ja: なのに工房でサンダル？

translation.en: - Pool wear? - Yes.
translation.ja: プール用？ ああ

translation.en: - Yes. - All right.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: There's something about you. I like you. Put your hair up, pull it back.
translation.ja: 君は気に入った 君は接客用に 髪を結んでくれ

translation.en: Make it more presentable.
translation.ja: 君は接客用に 髪を結んでくれ

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure thing.
translation.ja: 分かったわ

translation.en: - Sick! Look at her ear. It's bad. - What?
translation.ja: なんだその耳は？ つぶれてる

translation.en: - Y- Your ear is all messed up. - Oh, my God. Calm down.
translation.ja: なんだその耳は？ つぶれてる 何なのよ 独特な形なだけよ

translation.en: It's just cauliflower ear.
translation.ja: 何なのよ 独特な形なだけよ

translation.en: Yeah, but it is gross. Looks like a dog chewed on it.
translation.ja: 見苦しい 犬にかまれたみたい

translation.en: It stinks, too.
translation.ja: 臭い

translation.en: - It stinks? - It doesn't.
translation.ja: 臭いのか？ ウソよ

translation.en: Sarah used to be an MMA fighter.
translation.ja: サラは格闘家だ

translation.en: Yeah, and I had to retire after I got injured.
translation.ja: ケガして引退したの

translation.en: - Oh, my God. - It's an injury. I bet people are so happy to not see that melted thing.
translation.ja: それにしても 誰もそんな耳を見たくない

translation.en: What? They love it, okay? They love me and my ear.
translation.ja: 私も耳も大人気よ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: まあいい

translation.en: - Bye. Bye. - Come on, we got shit to do.
translation.ja: 行きましょ

translation.en: - - Hello, hello. Welcome to Rodman's.
translation.ja: ロッドマンにようこそ

translation.en: What can I get you?
translation.ja: 何にする？

translation.en: Hi. Um, can I have a Stella?
translation.ja: ステラある？

translation.en: We actually only serve our own beer here, so we don't have Stella,
translation.ja: 自家製のみだから ステラはないけど よく似たビールなら…

translation.en: but I'd be happy to find you something that is similar--
translation.ja: ステラはないけど よく似たビールなら…

translation.en: Sorry, you want a Stella?
translation.ja: ステラ？

translation.en: No, Stella is the most unoriginal beer in the world.
translation.ja: 最も独創性に欠くビールだよ

translation.en: So that means that you're the most unoriginal person in the world.
translation.ja: 飲む人も独創性に欠ける

translation.en: What about you? Hi, how are you?
translation.ja: そちらのお友達は何にする？

translation.en: - What are you thinking of having? - Do you have something like a Bud Light?
translation.ja: そちらのお友達は何にする？ バドライト風のもの

translation.en: Bud Light, Bud Light, Bud Light.
translation.ja: バドライト

translation.en: You can lap that up. It'll taste like Bud Light.
translation.ja: 俺のつばでも同じ味だ

translation.en: That's so gross.
translation.ja: サイアク

translation.en: I apologize on his behalf. The drinks are on me.
translation.ja: 申し訳ない おごるよ

translation.en: - We'll go to a different bar. - Weird.
translation.ja: 別の店に行くわ

translation.en: If we could buy your first round--
translation.ja: １杯目は無料…

translation.en: - No! Please come back again! -
translation.ja: 行かないで！

translation.en: What are you doing? You can't turn people away.
translation.ja: 客を追い返さないでよ

translation.en: Come on, they were barely people. They wanted to drink a Stella and a Bud Light.
translation.ja: かまわないさ ステラとバドライトだぜ

translation.en: Beer is about bringing people together, and Rodman's is the perfect hang.
translation.ja: ビール好きが集まる 最高の店がロッドマンだ

translation.en: What matters most is making the perfect beer.
translation.ja: 完璧なビール作り以外は 重要でない

translation.en: - Everything else is immaterial. - No.
translation.ja: 完璧なビール作り以外は 重要でない 違う　重要なのは客だよ

translation.en: What matters most is serving people,
translation.ja: 違う　重要なのは客だよ

translation.en: regardless of their beer preference, race, religion. That's the German way.
translation.ja: 好みや人種や宗教を 超越するのがドイツ流だ

translation.en: No, I don't think that's right.
translation.ja: それは どうかな

translation.en: I've never needed you.
translation.ja: 助けはいらん

translation.en: When you went off to Oregon State at 14 to get your stupid beer degree...
translation.ja: 14歳で オレゴン州立大学に行き― アホな専攻を…

translation.en: My master's of agricultural chemistry and zymurgy?
translation.ja: 農芸化学と醸造学の修士号

translation.en: ...I was learning how to make beer the hard way: on the streets and outdoor plazas of Europe.
translation.ja: 僕はヨーロッパの野外で ビールを作って学んだんだぞ

translation.en: Do have any idea how many beer gardens I drank my way through
translation.ja: 何軒のビアガーデンを回って 技を極めたと思う？

translation.en: - before I perfected my craft? - And what craft is that?
translation.ja: 何軒のビアガーデンを回って 技を極めたと思う？ 何の技だ？

translation.en: Throwing up on yourself
translation.ja: 吐く技？

translation.en: and then contracting super gonorrhea from a youth hostel toilet seat?
translation.ja: それで 安宿の便座で 淋(りん)病に感染？

translation.en: So you do follow me on Instagram!
translation.ja: インスタ見たな

translation.en: Okay, so you were able to drag your gonorrhea- riddled member
translation.ja: ビールを作る修道院に 淋(りん)病を持つ仲間を連れ込んで

translation.en: into a monastery where they make beer, and you memorized their recipes.
translation.ja: ビールを作る修道院に 淋(りん)病を持つ仲間を連れ込んで レシピを丸暗記

translation.en: That does not make you a Braumeister.
translation.ja: お前はビール職人ではなく―

translation.en: That makes you a Xerox machine.
translation.ja: ゼロックス(コピー機)だ

translation.en: What's a Xerox machine?
translation.ja: それ何？

translation.en: Can you get her out of here, please? Go.
translation.ja: 退席してもらえ

translation.en: Hi, sir.
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: Welcome to Rodman's. What can I get you?
translation.ja: 何にします？

translation.en: I'll have whatever you recommend.
translation.ja: 君のおすすめにする

translation.en: Whatever I recommend. Excellent.
translation.ja: おすすめですね

translation.en: Adam, this is how you run a brewery. Let me pull my Rodman Stiff Stout for you.
translation.ja: アダム 見てろよ スティフ(堅い)･スタウトにします

translation.en: Oh, I gotta change that name.
translation.ja: 改名しなきゃ

translation.en: And he wonders why people think we're a sex store.
translation.ja: アダルトショップと思われる

translation.en: - People don't think about you guys. - Here you go, sir.
translation.ja: 誰も知らないよ どうぞ

translation.en: - Thank you. - Take a sip.
translation.ja: どうも お味は？

translation.en: - Tasty. - Thank you.
translation.ja: うまいね

translation.en: - Are you Wilhelm Rodman? - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: 君がヴィルヘルム？

translation.en: You are three months behind on your rent. Pay up or you're gonna be evicted.
translation.ja: 君は 賃料３ヵ月滞納だ 払わなきゃ立ち退きだぞ

translation.en: This is really good.
translation.ja: 実にうまい

translation.en: It's definitely not, and I would've gotten him out of here two or three months ago.

translation.en: Hey, Will, how do you say you're fucked in German?
translation.ja: ドイツ語で“おしまい”は？

translation.en: I picked up a few things.
translation.ja: 聞いて覚えた

translation.en: Okay, we are not going out of business.
translation.ja: この店は畳まない

translation.en: We need to spend all of our time in putting together the perfect flight to impress the hell outta this distributor.
translation.ja: 完璧なサンプルセットで 卸売業者を感心させよう

translation.en: What's your favorite beer?
translation.ja: 好物は？

translation.en: I can run to Angel City and pick up a few kegs.
translation.ja: エンジェルシティで 買ってくる

translation.en: That's genius.
translation.ja: 天才だ

translation.en: I mean, I- I love where this guy's head is at.
translation.ja: お前は いいこと思い付くな

translation.en: - You're great. - Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: - I don't like where this is going. - It feels good here.
translation.ja: どうも まずい こっちは快調だ

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.ja: 何だこりゃ

translation.en: - - You came in a little hot again.
translation.ja: またしても激しい登場だね

translation.en: Sorry about that.
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: It's really hard to park when digitally stimulating each other.
translation.ja: 刺激し合っていると 難しいんだ

translation.en: You can park safely, or you can orgasm at the same time.
translation.ja: 安全に停車するか イクかの選択になる

translation.en: - I choose the orgasm. - Cool.
translation.ja: 私は後者にした

translation.en: Hey, this is my brother Adam.
translation.ja: 兄のアダムだ

translation.en: You guys look nothing alike.
translation.ja: 全く似てないね

translation.en: - Thank you. - Danke.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: - You look like lovers. - What?
translation.ja: 愛人同士に見える

translation.en: Yeah, lovers.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: - Do you ever...? - No!
translation.ja: 経験は？

translation.en: - That'd be fun. - Cute.
translation.ja: 楽しそう

translation.en: Barely talk.
translation.ja: 話もない

translation.en: Kids Menu! Open for business!
translation.ja: キッズメニューだよ！

translation.en: - Chicken fingers! Corn dogs! - Mac and cheese!
translation.ja: チキンにホットドッグ

translation.en: Juice boxes! Everything organic...
translation.ja: ジュースもね！ すべて地元で調達した 有機食材だよ

translation.en: - ...and locally sourced. - Wow.
translation.ja: すべて地元で調達した 有機食材だよ

translation.en: And adults actually consume this stuff?
translation.ja: 大人が食べる？

translation.en: Hell yeah, dude. Everyone loves ordering off the kids' menu.
translation.ja: キッズメニューは みんな好きだ

translation.en: - Who doesn't love a kids' menu? - Right? But restaurants make it off- limits for grown- ups.
translation.ja: でもレストランでは 大人は禁じられてる

translation.en: - For us... - ...nothing is off- limits.
translation.ja: ここでは… 禁じられてない

translation.en: - That's what I was gonna say. - I was gonna say that.
translation.ja: 息がぴったりだった

translation.en: - You're not-- oh, my-- -
translation.ja: やだ…　ちょっと…

translation.en: Nothing's off- limits.
translation.ja: なるほどな

translation.en: How do you do it? You live together, you work together. I'm presuming that you don't share deodorant together.
translation.ja: 生活も仕事も一緒だが デオドラントは分けてる？

translation.en: Correct. Deodorant is a tool of the government
translation.ja: そう デオドラントで 政府が人を追跡する

translation.en: - to track you. - To control you.
translation.ja: デオドラントで 政府が人を追跡する

translation.en: They put, uh, salt in it--
translation.ja: 塩を入れてある…

translation.en: Aluminum, baby.
translation.ja: アルミよ

translation.en: Thank you, babe. They put aluminum in it, and that's how they know where you are.
translation.ja: そうか アルミを入れて 人を追跡してるんだ

translation.en: God, it is so concerning that you run a food truck and you confused aluminum and salt.
translation.ja: 屋台の経営には アルミと塩は問題だよな

translation.en: Oh, no, they're both fine to eat. - You can just not put one under your arm. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 食べてもいいが わきの下に塗るのはダメ

translation.en: Do you guys ever get sick of each other?
translation.ja: 倦怠期(けんたいき)はないの？

translation.en: We've been together ten months and haven't spent a moment apart.
translation.ja: 10ヵ月 絶えず一緒にいる

translation.en: - Not one moment. - What about when you go to the bathroom?
translation.ja: ずっとね トイレに行くときは？

translation.en: What about it?
translation.ja: 違うの？

translation.en: - Can I order something? - Yes. We need hairnets.
translation.ja: 注文していい？ 帽子が要る

translation.en: Yes, sanitation is so important.
translation.ja: 衛生第一だ

translation.en: Totally.
translation.ja: 同感だね

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: あれ

translation.en: Cool, cool, cool. I'm gonna go.
translation.ja: もう結構だ　帰るよ

translation.en: - Uh, you should join me as well. - Hold on.
translation.ja: お前も来いよ

translation.en: You didn't dig in deep back there.
translation.ja: まだ奥まで届いてないわ

translation.en: Here, want me to give you a lift? Step on my hand.
translation.ja: ほら　手に乗って

translation.en: - Adam! - Yeah.
translation.ja: アダム！

translation.en: I think he's about to put a hairnet over his hat.
translation.ja: ヘアネットをかぶるとこだ

translation.en: Yeah, there you go. Okay, right up there.
translation.ja: そう　その上よ

translation.en: - Hello. - Hi.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: Cole Harris. - East Valley Craft Distribution. - Yes.
translation.ja: 私はコール･ハリス イーストバレーの卸だ

translation.en: - Wilhelm Rodman, brewmaster. - Hello.
translation.ja: 職人のヴィルヘルム

translation.en: Adam Rodman. Hi. Head brewmaster.
translation.ja: 職人長のアダムだ

translation.en: - Hi there. Hi. - Okay. Hi.
translation.ja: そうか　やあ

translation.en: - - Don't make it weird.
translation.ja: 変だぞ

translation.en: - Let him go. - All right.
translation.ja: 手を放せ

translation.en: - So sorry. - Okay.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: - Cool. - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: では

translation.en: So, uh, which one of you is in charge?
translation.ja: どっちが責任者？

translation.en: I am.
translation.ja: 僕です

translation.en: Family business, like the Lehman Brothers.
translation.ja: リーマン兄弟流だな

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, big fans.
translation.ja: 大ファンです

translation.en: You don't know who they are. They stole a lot of money.
translation.ja: 大金を盗んだ兄弟だ

translation.en: Take a seat, and I will bring a flight that is going to...
translation.ja: サンプルセットを お持ちします

translation.en: bedazzle you.
translation.ja: 仰天ですよ

translation.en: Okay. Great.
translation.ja: それはいいな

translation.en: Bedazzle him?
translation.ja: “仰天”ってダサいぞ

translation.en: - Oof! That was bad, even for you. - I am nervous!
translation.ja: “仰天”ってダサいぞ 緊張したんだ

translation.en: So, what restaurants are gonna be serving my beer selection?
translation.ja: うちのビールは どのレストランに出します？

translation.en: Off the top of my head, I think the Tipsy Cow
translation.ja: ティプシー･カウと ローカル･ペザントだろう

translation.en: and the Local Peasant have a tap open for local brews.
translation.ja: ティプシー･カウと ローカル･ペザントだろう 地ビール用のタップがある

translation.en: Fantastic. And these establishments, what kind of savory apps are they serving?
translation.ja: すばらしい その２店で 出している食事は？

translation.en: Uh, I mean, I- I really enjoy the short- rib poutine.
translation.ja: ショートリブの プーティンが好きだ

translation.en: - Are you writing that down? - I'm not.
translation.ja: メモ？ いいえ

translation.en: - I see you writing things down. - It looks like that, but I'm not.
translation.ja: 書いたのを見たぞ 気のせいです

translation.en: You just wrote down what I like to eat.
translation.ja: 私の好物を書いた

translation.en: I honestly did not. You can trust me.
translation.ja: 書いてません

translation.en: - Okay. - But I- I'm curious, how often do these establishments clean out their taps?
translation.ja: でもどの頻度で タップを洗ってるか知りたい

translation.en: Uh, I don't-- When they're supposed to?
translation.ja: 洗うべきとき？

translation.en: - Okay, that's all I need. - Are you writing that down?
translation.ja: こちらの質問は以上だ

translation.en: - This isn't gonna work out. - Excuse me?
translation.ja: 残念だね 何だと？ 質問はこっちがする

translation.en: Wait, are you interviewing me? I'm interviewing you.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 質問はこっちがする

translation.en: - No! - Now that the interview's over, I am willing to admit to you I've been writing things down.
translation.ja: 面接が終わったので 書いてたことは認めよう

translation.en: I knew it. You wrote it all down.
translation.ja: そうだと思った

translation.en: Adam! Adam! I'm so sorry about him.
translation.ja: お待たせして申し訳ない

translation.en: Why don't you take a quick sample of our four most popular beers?
translation.ja: 人気の４つを 試飲してください

translation.en: - Okay. - Let me stop you.
translation.ja: ちょっと待った

translation.en: I believe that we have a right to know
translation.ja: 知る権利がある

translation.en: if the food these establishments are serving tastes like, as you would say, große Scheiße,
translation.ja: その店で出してる 食事の味は―

translation.en: which is German for--
translation.ja: ドイツ語で…

translation.en: - Yeah, I know what it means. - It's like big shit.
translation.ja: 知ってる “巨大クソ”だ

translation.en: - Yeah. - I don't know if you knew that.
translation.ja: 初耳だろ

translation.en: - I knew it. - Okay.
translation.ja: 知ってた

translation.en: You know what I think? I think we're done here.
translation.ja: もう終わりにしよう

translation.en: Done? You're gonna order without sampling?
translation.ja: 試飲もしないで終了？

translation.en: Incredible. How many kegs can we sign you up for?
translation.ja: 何本注文する？

translation.en: I think I'll order... nein. Which is German for none.
translation.ja: 注文数は ドイツ語で“なし”だ

translation.en: - Oh, no, it's not. - See what I did?
translation.ja: 分かったか？

translation.en: No, nein would actually just be no.
translation.ja: ノーという意味だ

translation.en: Cole, please, please--
translation.ja: コール　頼むよ

translation.en: - Bye! - What are you doing?
translation.ja: じゃ 何すんだ？

translation.en: I just hope the next guy's more collaborative. That's what I'll say.
translation.ja: 次の人に期待しようぜ

translation.en: What next guy? There's one guy in Van Nuys! One guy!
translation.ja: バンナイズに 卸は１人だけだ！

translation.en: There's one distributor, and it's that guy?
translation.ja: あの男だけが卸売業者？

translation.en: Van Nuys, it's a bad place--
translation.ja: バンナイズは最悪だ

translation.en: - Is this what happened to your ear? - Shut up, you baby!
translation.ja: 引っ張るな 黙りなさい

translation.en: You know what?
translation.ja: 捜すんじゃなかった

translation.en: - I never should've tracked you down. - I never should've accepted your offer.
translation.ja: 捜すんじゃなかった 断るべきだった 君の耳よりひどい店で

translation.en: This place is even more of a disaster than your melted ear.
translation.ja: 断るべきだった 君の耳よりひどい店で チュイが哀れだ

translation.en: - I feel bad for Chuy. - Wanna go for round two?
translation.ja: チュイが哀れだ いくわよ

translation.en: - I don't! - See where he parked?
translation.ja: やめろ 車は？

translation.en: - I'll find him. - Thanks.
translation.ja: 私が捜す どうも

translation.en: You are doing the same thing you always do.
translation.ja: お前は相変わらず 全てをぶち壊す

translation.en: - You ruin everything. - Oh, hard disagree.
translation.ja: お前は相変わらず 全てをぶち壊す 違うさ

translation.en: No, don't sit. You're out. Get out.
translation.ja: 座るな　出ていけ

translation.en: - I'm out? - Uh- huh.
translation.ja: 俺が？

translation.en: - Okay. - This is done.
translation.ja: 終わりだ

translation.en: - Okay, great. - Yeah.
translation.ja: かまわないよ

translation.en: - Bye. - See ya. This was a wonderful reunion.
translation.ja: 最低の再会だ

translation.en: Bye.
translation.ja: じゃな

translation.en: - Fuck. - What?
translation.ja: クソッ 何だ？

translation.en: I have nowhere else to go.
translation.ja: 行く所がない

translation.en: What do you mean? You said you were killing it in Portland.
translation.ja: ポートランドで 大成功してるだろ？

translation.en: I was.
translation.ja: 昔はな

translation.en: I had a falling out with the local brewers.
translation.ja: 工房ともめた

translation.en: - There's, like, 100 breweries out there. - There's 84.
translation.ja: 100軒はあるだろ 84軒だ

translation.en: And a lot of them are very bad.
translation.ja: ろくな工房がない

translation.en: Some of them, their best brews taste like the cadaver of a local garbageman.
translation.ja: 廃品回収した 死体みたいな味だと―

translation.en: I say that as a fan.
translation.ja: 親切心から言った

translation.en: Did you tell them that?
translation.ja: 言ったのか？

translation.en: Yes, I told them that, okay? It was at a beer expo.
translation.ja: 言ったさ ビール博覧会で マイクを渡され―

translation.en: Someone gave me a microphone, I started riffing,
translation.ja: ビール博覧会で マイクを渡され― 発言したら怒った

translation.en: and people couldn't handle it.
translation.ja: 発言したら怒った

translation.en: I also had a problem with the fact that they were letting IPAs into the competitions.
translation.ja: 大会がＩＰＡの展示を 許可したのも問題だった

translation.en: IPAs are what people drink when they're all out of good ideas
translation.ja: アイデアが浮かばないときに 飲むのがＩＰＡだ

translation.en: or never had a good idea to begin with.
translation.ja: そもそも名案のない人が飲む

translation.en: - - Oh-- Okay, okay, yeah!
translation.ja: 何だよ！

translation.en: So I submitted an IPA that had a hallucinogen in it.
translation.ja: だから ＩＰＡに幻覚剤を入れた

translation.en: You tried to drug everyone?
translation.ja: 薬を盛ろうと？

translation.en: That's the difference between you and me.
translation.ja: 俺たちの違う点だ

translation.en: You try, I succeed.
translation.ja: お前は試みるだけ 俺は結果をもたらす

translation.en: - - How's that for an IPA?
translation.ja: ＩＰＡはどう？

translation.en: You can't tell, but I'm giving you all the finger.
translation.ja: 分からないだろうが 中指を立てて侮辱している

translation.en: So for that reason, I'm no longer allowed to brew in Portland, or be in Portland...
translation.ja: そのせいでポートランドから 追放された

translation.en: or be in Oregon. I gotta stay here.
translation.ja: オレゴンからもだ

translation.en: You're a bad person if you make me leave... frankly.
translation.ja: 俺を追い出すと お前は悪い人になる

translation.en: Columbus.
translation.ja: コロンブス

translation.en: Simcoe, from back home.
translation.ja: 故郷のシムコー

translation.en: Hmm, pretty sure it's Columbus.
translation.ja: コロンブスだ

translation.en: I can't believe I'm about to say this,
translation.ja: 我ながら 驚きの発言だが

translation.en: but I guess we can try working together again.
translation.ja: また一緒に ビールを作ってみるか

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
translation.ja: ありがとう ウィル

translation.en: And this room'll do.
translation.ja: この部屋でいい　仲直りだ

translation.en: - This-- It'll do. So, we're good. - What? No.
translation.ja: この部屋でいい　仲直りだ ダメだ

translation.en: The bed feels like the natural spot.
translation.ja: ベッドもいい場所だ

translation.en: - Oh, yeah. - Don't!
translation.ja: やめろよ

translation.en: - Come on, man, that's my spot. - Sorry about the shoes.
translation.ja: 僕のベッドだ 靴で失礼

translation.en: There's so many other spots you can live.
translation.ja: 他にも場所はある

translation.en: - I belong here. - It's my bed.
translation.ja: 快適 僕のだぞ

translation.en: - It feels like it's my bed. - You don't wanna sleep there.
translation.ja: 俺のベッドと感じる やめとけ

translation.en: I jerk off... a lot...
translation.ja: そこで かなりオナニーした

translation.en: - here. - You want to talk about that right now?
translation.ja: そこで かなりオナニーした その話する？

translation.en: No, I'm just saying, I wouldn't want to, like, lay in your juice,
translation.ja: 兄弟の精液(ジュース)のついた場所で 僕なら寝たくないから…

translation.en: - so why would you want to lay-- - In my juice?
translation.ja: 俺のジュース？

translation.en: - You want to know what I do? - No.
translation.ja: 聞きたいか？

translation.en: I edge myself to orgasm but once a month.
translation.ja: 俺がオナニーでイくのは 月に１回だ

translation.en: Twelve times a year. You know math?
translation.ja: 年間12回

translation.en: And basically, you pleasure yourself right to the point of climax,
translation.ja: 要するに気持ちよくなって 絶頂に達する直前にやめる

translation.en: and then you dial it back.
translation.ja: 絶頂に達する直前にやめる

translation.en: And you do that every single day for 30 days,
translation.ja: それを30日間 毎日やって

translation.en: and then right on that last day, you just... explode.
translation.ja: 最後の日は ただ噴射するんだ

translation.en: And what you produce is like a bottle- conditioned saison: frothy, rich, distinct.
translation.ja: 精液が“瓶内発酵”されて クリーミーで濃厚になるんだ

translation.en: Right now, I'm kinda sensitive 'cause I'm on day nine.
translation.ja: 今日は９日目だから 敏感になってる

translation.en: So... fermentation has just begun.
translation.ja: つまり 発酵が始まったところだ

translation.en: I am frickin' amazing.
translation.ja: 私って すごいわよ

translation.en: I convinced the distributor to come back in a couple weeks,
translation.ja: ２週間後に来るよう 卸売業者を説得した

translation.en: on two conditions.
translation.ja: 条件が２つ

translation.en: One: he's not allowed to talk.
translation.ja: 彼は話さないこと

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: そんな

translation.en: Two: I promised you'd make a new beer for him.
translation.ja: 新作ビールを作ること

translation.en: - Yes, yes, yes, yes. - Sarah, you-- you're incredible.
translation.ja: もちろん！ すばらしいよ サラ

translation.en: I know.
translation.ja: でしょ

translation.en: What to brew? What to brew?
translation.ja: 何を醸造するかな？

translation.en: What about a lager?
translation.ja: ラガーは？

translation.en: A lager? No, it takes too long to brew. Not that I've made one since I was in diapers.
translation.ja: 醸造時間が長すぎるし 久しく作ってない

translation.en: What about a rauch porter?
translation.ja: スモークポーターは？

translation.en: No. Smoked ale, it's too risky.
translation.ja: 燻製(くんせい)は危険だ

translation.en: What if we make something that everyone's into, like a hazy IPA?
translation.ja: 皆が好きなヘイジーＩＰＡは

translation.en: That's exactly why we shouldn't make it.
translation.ja: だからこそ避ける

translation.en: Wait, there's different kinds of beers? Why?
translation.ja: ビールに種類があるの？

translation.en: Fine, if it'll make you stop whining, I'll make something hoppier.
translation.ja: ホップを効かせればいいだろ

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm in LA for one day, and I'm already selling out.
translation.ja: ロス初日から 信念を曲げることに

translation.en: No, I'm used to making them. I'm gonna make it.
translation.ja: 作り慣れてる僕が作るよ

translation.en: - You? - Yeah.
translation.ja: お前が？

translation.en: You think you can brew a better beer than me, Wilhelm the Lesser?
translation.ja: 俺より うまくできるのか？

translation.en: I know I can.
translation.ja: できる

translation.en: - May the best beer win. - Okay.
translation.ja: 競争だ いいだろう

translation.en: - Can I-- No. - I'm not gonna fight you.
translation.ja: どけよ やめろ

translation.en: - You got there after me. - Unfair.
translation.ja: お前は後ろだ ずるい

translation.en: - Let go. - No.
translation.ja: 放せよ

translation.en: - We're not-- - Let go of my leg.
translation.ja: 足をつかむな

translation.en: Why is this vest so slippery?
translation.ja: このベストは手が滑る

translation.en: Be still, my hairless avenger.
translation.ja: おとなしくするんだよ

translation.en: Just 15 more sleeps, big guy.
translation.ja: あと15日の辛抱だ

translation.en: - I can hear you. - No, I know.
translation.ja: 聞こえるぞ 知ってる

translation.en: You listening is an important part of the process.
translation.ja: 聞かせるのも大事な過程だ

translation.en: What time are you gonna go paint that house, you cretin?
translation.ja: 家のペンキ塗りは？　うつけ

translation.en: - What's a cretin? - A cretin is an idiot.
translation.ja: 何それ その言葉さえ知らない “バカ”のことだ

translation.en: Typically, cretins don't know the word cretin, so...
translation.ja: その言葉さえ知らない “バカ”のことだ

translation.en: Why would you call a--
translation.ja: なんで…

translation.en: Unbelievable.
translation.ja: あきれた

translation.en: - So, is the bat part of your recipe? - No. But this one is.
translation.ja: バットも材料なのか？ これはね

translation.en: Hey, I found my keys
translation.ja: カギを見つけたよ！

translation.en: and another bat, Will.
translation.ja: バットもね

translation.en: Oh, shit, where's my wallet?
translation.ja: 財布を落とした

translation.en: Don't go back in.
translation.ja: 戻るなよ

translation.en: Oh, what is that putrid smell? Right, no, I forgot.
translation.ja: 腐った臭いがする 忘れてた

translation.en: You're brewing as well.
translation.ja: お前の酒か

translation.en: Oh! Acid attack. Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 酸をかけるなよ

translation.en: You should go back to your little monk buddies
translation.ja: 修道院に戻って石臼でも引け

translation.en: and go milling again 'cause this is a ruined batch.
translation.ja: そのバッチは 役に立たん

translation.en: I know what I'm doing, okay?
translation.ja: 僕に抜かりはない

translation.en: Oh, that has been disproven time and again.
translation.ja: それは間違いだと 何度となく証明されている

translation.en: Get off of me, shitty beard!
translation.ja: 放せ！　このくそヒゲが

translation.en: Nothing like watching two betas fight.
translation.ja: 軟弱者の争いって最高

translation.en: I'm gonna digitally remove their clothes and sell this in Japan.
translation.ja: 裸に編集すれば日本で売れる

translation.en: Hey, you're just nervous my beer is gonna be better than yours.
translation.ja: 僕の方が優れてることが 不安なんだろ

translation.en: I'm never nervous!
translation.ja: 不安に思ったことなどない

translation.en: - Stay there, you little fish. - No!
translation.ja: くだらんヤツめ

translation.en: Oh, I gotcha!
translation.ja: 逃げられんぞ

translation.en: Do you give up?
translation.ja: 降参する？

translation.en: - Friar Lucas, attack! -
translation.ja: フライアー･ルーカス！ 攻撃しろ！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: よせ　フライアー･ルーカス

translation.en: Friar Lucas, I'm sensitive. I'm very sensitive right now, Friar Lucas.
translation.ja: よせ　フライアー･ルーカス 今の俺は敏感なんだ

translation.en: Please don't--
translation.ja: やめろ

translation.en: Oh, I'm ticklish. No, no, no, no. Ooh.
translation.ja: くすぐったい よせ

translation.en: Oh, boy! Oh, it's happening.
translation.ja: もうダメ 我慢できない

translation.en: What is your problem? Give me that. - Come on. - Come on.
translation.ja: 何してるの？　貸しなさい

translation.en: And I'm back to day one.
translation.ja: １日目に逆戻りだ

translation.en: I prematurely ejaculated after 29 days.
translation.ja: 29日目に 射精してしまうなんて

translation.en: Is that ironic?
translation.ja: 皮肉だよな

translation.en: Good luck with the distributor today, man.
translation.ja: 幸運を祈ってるよ

translation.en: Thank you, Elvis.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: - - Oh, hey, hold on. Take this.
translation.ja: これもあげるよ

translation.en: - I don't want it. - It's for luck.
translation.ja: いらない 運が向くから持っていけ

translation.en: It's my gift to you. Take the gift.
translation.ja: 運が向くから持っていけ

translation.en: Nothing weird about it. It's just one man giving another man a sandwich.
translation.ja: サンドイッチを あげるだけだ

translation.en: Where's that negative energy coming from? Your aura is wild right now.
translation.ja: その負の空気は何だ？ オーラが荒れてるぞ

translation.en: - Your fries. - Thank you.
translation.ja: ポテトよ

translation.en: - I'm loving these chicken wings-- - You try it.
translation.ja: このチキンが大好きだ 餌だよ

translation.en: - Uh, fingers. Fingers. -
translation.ja: フライだね

translation.en: Rebecckay.
translation.ja: レベッケイ

translation.en: It's Becky.
translation.ja: ベッキーよ

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: Ooh, look at you, Field of Dreams. You have zero chance with Becky.
translation.ja: その顔は何だ 言い寄っても無駄だぞ

translation.en: She and Elvis are like the same person.
translation.ja: エルビスと一体だ

translation.en: Oh, Will, I would not expect you to understand chemistry.
translation.ja: ウィル… お前に相性は分からん

translation.en: - Here. I'll give you a free lecture. - Oh.
translation.ja: ただで教えてやるよ

translation.en: - - Becky, hey.
translation.ja: ベッキー　ちょっと

translation.en: Look, I was wondering if I could get a little mustard.
translation.ja: マスタードをくれないか

translation.en: Thank you. This is relish.
translation.ja: これは薬味(レリッシュ)だよ

translation.en: That's good, though.
translation.ja: いいけどね

translation.en: Chemistry. She practically stank of sex.
translation.ja: 相性だな セックスの香りがする

translation.en: Yeah, because she's currently having it with her boyfriend.
translation.ja: 彼氏との真っ最中だからな

translation.en: Hey, guys, the distributor's on his way.
translation.ja: 卸売業者が到着するわよ

translation.en: - Shit. - Oh. Great.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Two brand- new IPAs and zero questions about the menu from my brother.
translation.ja: 新作のＩＰＡ２つです あと兄には質問させません

translation.en: - And let's keep it that way. - Hmm.
translation.ja: そうしてくれ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: では

translation.en: Goal!
translation.ja: ゴール！

translation.en: Chivas scores!
translation.ja: チーバスが得点

translation.en: - Chuy, put it away! - Yup. I have it recorded. It's old.
translation.ja: チュイ　あとにして 昔の録画だ

translation.en: This is really good.
translation.ja: これはいい

translation.en: But this beer's fantastic.
translation.ja: でも こっちは格段にいい

translation.en: I could sell this one. I want ten kegs of this.
translation.ja: でも こっちは格段にいい 樽(たる)を10本買うよ

translation.en: - This is great. - Ten kegs?
translation.ja: すばらしい

translation.en: - Yes. - Ten kegs? He wants ten kegs!
translation.ja: ビア樽(だる)を10本だって！

translation.en: - We did it! - We did it!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: Ah, congratulations, buddy. It's your beer.
translation.ja: おめでとう　お前のビールだ

translation.en: That is not my beer.
translation.ja: 違うよ

translation.en: We're still laughing. We're having fun!
translation.ja: 僕たちは こっちで祝おう

translation.en: I know it wasn't your beer.
translation.ja: 知ってるさ

translation.en: I swapped them out at the last second so that you wouldn't lose your shit - when my beer won. - No, no.
translation.ja: 俺が勝っても怒らないように 入れ替えたんだ

translation.en: - No. - You said you wouldn't do this. You're not letting me celebrate and gloat and have a good time.
translation.ja: 勝利を楽しませると 約束したろ

translation.en: No, we have bigger problems now. I pissed in your beer.
translation.ja: もっと大問題だ 小便したんだ

translation.en: - You what? - I pissed in your beer.
translation.ja: 何と？ お前の樽(たる)に小便した

translation.en: Guys, I taste a lot of beers.
translation.ja: いろんなビールを飲んだが 独特の味がする

translation.en: This is so unique. It's distinctive.
translation.ja: いろんなビールを飲んだが 独特の味がする 格別だ

translation.en: You know what? Let's make it 20 kegs.
translation.ja: やっぱり20本にする

translation.en: I want to put this in every restaurant possible, all right?
translation.ja: レストラン全店で出したい

translation.en: - Yes! - Oh, my God!
translation.ja: すごい！

translation.en: - What are we gonna do? - I don't know.
translation.ja: どうする？ バカだな そんなに小便できない

translation.en: You're an imbecile, and I don't have that much piss.
translation.ja: バカだな そんなに小便できない

translation.en: Mmm! I love it!
translation.ja: うまい！
